text: Paul Marland (19 March 1940 – 7 April 2021) was a British Conservative politician. Marland became a Member of Parliament for the marginal seat of West Gloucestershire from Labour in 1979. He served until 1997. He was president of the National Conservative Convention in 2005.Rulemakers who rarely rebel The Times 24 May 2005 Marland died in April 2021 at the age of 81.Paul Marland obituary ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:UK MPs 1979–1983 Category:UK MPs 1983–1987 Category:UK MPs 1987–1992 Category:UK MPs 1992–1997 Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs
